Posted By: Lee
Hi Gil,

While I don't have a n172 carpenter for sale, I do have a n173 OJ Carpenter Cab for sale. The bottom ad has been trimmed off, but the rest of the card presents nicely and is crease free. A scan of the card can be seen a few posts down from this one on the 19th century b/s/t. E-mail me if you are interested.

Thanks,
Lee H

Posted By: G. Maines

Good luck,
Gil
